title: League of Legends Disconnecting
body: So I play league of legends all the time with my friends and I actually stopped playing CSGO (I was Supreme) to play with them because of how enjoyable the game was for me. I love playing different champions and getting level 7 mastery just to taunt my friends but recently I am having a huge problem... disconnecting. I never leave games(or leave as infrequently as can) because I feel like I am letting my team down if I do, but just recently I have been getting disconnected with league a lot. It's so bad at this point that I have actually had multiple cool-downs and lost ranked games due to the problem. I have no idea why I can't stay connected to the league of legends servers because other games work great. I uninstalled and reinstalled league but it did nothing. I even downloaded a program called haste(which I found from a SoloRenektonOnly ad),but that doesn't work either. If anyone knows ways that I could just stay connected to the game that would be awesome because I really don't want to be banned or lose anymore ranked game just because my internet craps out on me. Thanks

replies.body: It's likely that your client isn't connecting to the Server! The steps in our [Connection Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664) should resolve the issue and get you back in the game. If it continues after that it may be best to run through our [Log Reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743) to find the source of the problem.
